name: OMT
about: OMT是基于OMP链发行的生态代币，作为One More钱包链上应用的DAO流通代币，包括去中心化金融应用、流动性挖矿、多链NFT交易、NFT铸造、等行为。
about_en: OMT is an ecological token issued based on OMP chain, which is used as the DAO circulation token for One More wallet chain applications, including decentralized financial applications, liquidity mining, multi chain NFT transactions, NFT casting, etc.
about_cn: OMT是基于OMP链发行的生态代币，作为One More钱包链上应用的DAO流通代币，包括去中心化金融应用、流动性挖矿、多链NFT交易、NFT铸造、等行为。
